name: ACP Agent Registry
description: Joint launch by JetBrains and Zed of the official ACP (Agent Client Protocol) Registry - a directory of AI coding agents integrated directly into JetBrains IDEs and Zed editor. Enables one-click installation and management of AI coding agents like Gemini CLI, Claude Code, OpenCode, Copilot, and Mistral Vibe.
community_quotes: AI coding agents are multiplying fast
Browse what's available, click Install, and start working right away
Think of it like the Language Server Protocol, but for AI agents

name: Kilo Code Reviewer
description: Automatic AI-powered code reviewer that activates when you open a PR. Launched on Product Hunt on January 27, 2026, winning 'Launch of the Day'. Builds on Kilo Code's existing open-source AI coding assistant for JetBrains IDEs.
community_quotes: Won 'Launch of the Day' on Product Hunt
Automatic AI-powered code review when you open a PR

name: SERA (Soft-Verified Efficient Repository Agents)
description: Ai2's (Allen Institute for AI) first release in their Open Coding Agents family. Open-source coding agent achieving 46.6% on SWE-bench Verified. Available in 8B and 32B parameter models, designed for repository-level automation workflows on private codebases. Reduces training costs by up to 11x.
community_quotes: Open-source coding agents just got accessible
Can adapt to private codebases for $400-$12K

name: Kimi K2.5 Coding Agent
description: Moonshot AI's release of Kimi K2.5 open-source model with coding agent capabilities featuring Agent Swarms (coordinates up to 100 agents working in parallel), visual agentic intelligence (generates code from UI designs), and advanced multimodal training.
community_quotes: Most powerful open source LLM beating Opus 4.5
Expands what open-weight models can do

name: Mastra 1.0
description: TypeScript-based AI framework for building AI-powered applications and agents. Launched on Product Hunt January 22, 2026, ranked #4 with 459 upvotes. Part of Y Combinator W25 batch. Features persistent context management and memory for AI agents.
community_quotes: Ranked #4 on Product Hunt with 459 upvotes
Build AI agents with a modern TypeScript stack
All-in-one framework for building AI-powered applications

name: OpenCode AI
description: Open-source AI coding agent for the terminal with native TUI (Terminal User Interface), model-agnostic architecture (supports Claude, GPT, Gemini), and multi-session support. Explosive community adoption with 70,000+ GitHub stars as of January 2026.
community_quotes: The complete guide to the open-source terminal coding agent revolutionizing development in 2026
